data.name: Vampire Slayer: New Blood
data.detailed_description:
Vampire Slayer: New Blood is a fast-paced, multiplayer shooter that pits you and your friends against another team of players in an all-out battle to the death. Players must choose a side and fight till the bloody end, battling it out in a variety of locales. With a wide list of fearless characters, players can decide between the quick-witted and talented Slayers or the demons of the night themselves, the Vampires.


As a Vampire, use Blood Vision to track Slayers, invisibility to hunt or escape, and jump or leap at great distances. Slayers can use telekinetic powers to push vampires away when crowded, cite a prayer to protect you from evil, and much more. Learn to master every character, each of which comes with its own unique weapons and abilities


Players will be able to duke it out on several maps which vary in size and style, from an evacuated, bloody subway station to a cold, terrifying cemetery. Smash through shop fronts and paint the streets red on Blood Avenue or play in a close-quarter environment like Dracula's Castle.

Learn to master every character, each of which comes with its own unique weapons and abilities


Players will be able to duke it out on several maps which vary in size and style, from an evacuated, bloody subway station to a cold, terrifying cemetery. Smash through shop fronts and paint the streets red on Blood Avenue or play in a close-quarter environment like Dracula's Castle.
data.short_description: Vampire Slayer: New Blood is a multiplayer first-person action shooter. Locations are varied and detailed, and each character comes with its own unique weapons and abilities. Pick a side, squad up, and master a rising roster of fearless characters in this fast-paced bloody FPS.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 950 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher.
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher.
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
